General.Name: InCity Immobilien AG
General.Description: InCity Immobilien AG operates as a multi-disciplinary real estate company in the metropolitan regions of Germany. It primarily invests in commercial real estate comprising office and retail space, as well as residential units. The company's portfolio included seven properties in Berlin and Frankfurt am Main. It is also involved in the provision of asset management and project development services. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Schönefeld, Germany. InCity Immobilien AG operates as a subsidiary of Realsoul Holding S.A.
